title: News24.com | Lockdown: 16 South Africans who were stranded in Dubai and Doha return home
description: The Department of International Relations and Cooperation has welcomed the successful repatriation of 16 South Africans who were stranded in Dubai and Doha.
content:
The Department of International Relations and Cooperation has welcomed the successful repatriation of 16 South Africans who were stranded in Dubai and Doha.
